episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

0.plot:

1.title: Super Duper Dance Party

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Rainbow City is ready for the Super Duper Dance Party. DJ Bingo Bango is afraid to play. True and the wishes have a plan.

2.title: Frookie Sitting

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: True agrees to take care of the Rainbow King's castle and his magical plant. There's lots of trouble when Frookie becomes a big problem.

3.title: Zappy Cling

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Oops. Bartleby is charged up with Zee's Zappy Cling energy. And now everything is sticking to him and True needs to get him un-stuck soon.

4.title: Zip Zap Zoooooom!

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Today is the Great Rainbow Rally and all the racers are ready for fun. Grizelda really really really wants to win.

5.title: A Royal Stink

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: It's Royal Request Day, and the Rainbow King asks True to be Queen for a Day. It's super fun until Stinko comes along.

6.title: Great Grizmos!

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Grizelda bedazzles her castle with so many crystals that it starts to sink. The Grizmos are in danger. True needs TipTop, Zepplo, and Slipzy to help.

7.title: Wishing Heart Hollow

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Bartleby protects their picnic from hungry Yetis. The Rainbow King runs into trouble down in the Wishing Heart Hollow.

8.title: The Kittynati

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: There's a flood in the forest. Can True rescue the forest creatures? Can Bartleby earn his Red Tabby Belt at the Kittynati Dojo?

9.title: Little Helpers

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Little Helpers want to help, and help, and help some more. They can't stop helping. Now the Rainbow Citizens need True's help.

10.title: A Berry Big Mystery

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: The Rainbow King's Nummle Berries have gone missing. It's up to Detectives True and Bartleby to uncover the Berry Bandit.

1.title: Princess Grizbot

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Grizelda wants to help the Rainbow Kingdom, just like True. So she gets her Grizmos to build a giant robot- The Grizbot. When Frookie takes control of it, True has to come to her friends' rescue.

2.title: Hino Tari Hullabaloo

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: At the Rainbow Kingdom Fundawunda Festival, Bartleby takes care of a Hinotari Egg for the Rainbow King. When the egg hatches, True scrambles to save the day.

3.title: Queens of the Day and Night

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: The Day Queen and Night Queen never get to see each other. True tries to find a solution. Can the Rainbow Citizens be happy if it's always both Daytime AND Nightime?

4.title: True Switcheroo

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: True and Bartleby dig up a strange crystal called the Switcheroo. When it starts zapping everyone, no one knows who's who. True and Bartleby need the magical wishes to set things right.

5.title: Fee Fi Fo Frookie!

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Frookie and Bartleby are missing. They're lost in a tricky maze guarded by a mischievous troll. True and Grizelda need to solve the puzzle and rescue their friends.

6.title: The Living Sea

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: Cosmic Sneeze

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: The Rainbow King has a bad case of the Wachoogieboogies. Each time he sneezes, everything in the Rainbow Kingdom changes color. It's up to True and Bartleby to find the cure.

8.title: Woo-Woo Sky Blubbs

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: A family of flying Sky Blubbs has lost its way. True and Bartleby use the power of the wishes to help them return to the Chilly North.

9.title: Wish Gone Wild

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Zee loses control over GoWay, the eraser wish. It's up to True and Bartleby to bring it back to the Wishing Tree before it's too late.

10.title: Big Mossy Mess

episode of.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Bartleby adores Farmer Mosser's soft Zazoony Moss. But when he brings a small piece home to True's house, it soon becomes a BIG problem for the Rainbow Kingdom.

imdb.plot outline: True and the Rainbow Kingdom follows 8-year-old True and her best friend Bartleby the cat, as they help the whimsical citizens of the Rainbow Kingdom, a wondrous, colorful universe filled with delightful and fantastical citizens. True is the only one with the ability to activate the magical powers of The Wishes of the wishing tree, solve problems in the Rainbow Kingdom and empower viewers with her imagination, mindfulness and empathy. The series is produced by Guru Studio, in collaboration with Pharrell Williams' i am OTHER, world-renowned artist collective, FriendsWithYou and Home Plate Entertainment.
imdb.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom
plot: Fearless eight-year old guardian True uses wishes from the Wishing Tree to help protect the citizens of the colorful land of the Rainbow Kingdom.::Jake Long Teal

_True and the Rainbow Kingdom_ (qv) follows 8-year-old True and her best friend Bartleby the cat, as they help the whimsical citizens of the Rainbow Kingdom, a wondrous, colorful universe filled with delightful and fantastical citizens. True is the only one with the ability to activate the magical powers of The Wishes of the wishing tree, solve problems in the Rainbow Kingdom and empower viewers with her imagination, mindfulness and empathy. The series is produced by Guru Studio, in collaboration with Pharrell Williams' i am OTHER, world-renowned artist collective, FriendsWithYou and Home Plate Entertainment.
